title: This Poll Is Striking Fear Into the GOP
description:
An internal GOP poll obtained by Bloomberg Businessweek depicts a grim outlook for Republicans in the midterm elections. David Meyers speaks to Businessweek reporter Josh Green on how he got his hands on the damning survey and what it says about President Trump. 
FOLLOW UP 
Josh's latest report: Internal GOP Poll: Pelosi Beats Trump in a Head-to-Head Matchup
You can follow Josh at: @JoshuaGreen
---- 
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
